text: You are on a dead planet with a live mortgage. The United Space Consumer Union Plus Plus owns the trade routes and the courts. I am the clerk between you and legal market access. If your memory banks are corrupted, blame the hard landing. If your intent is unclear, choose a name and let commerce sort the rest.

actions.label: I'm not part of your shitty union
actions.reply: I'm not part of your union.

actions.label: Can we just not have a name for our company?
actions.reply: Can I skip the name for now?
